title: LIST wrongly returns a collection that could not be created, since no configset exists
description:

comments.author: Andreas Hubold
comments.content: I'm unable to reproduce this issue with Solr version 7.5.0. It might have been fixed in the meantime.

comments.author: Erick Erickson
comments.content: I'm closing since it apparently can't be reproduced, it's been a long time since 4.x. We can reopen if necessary.
